title: Typophile Widget (for Mac)
content:
We’re happy to announce the release of our new Typophile RSS widget. This handy interface let’s you stay aware of new Typophile activity from the comfort of your OS X Tiger desktop.

More info here: [http://typophile.com/resources/widgets](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329202454/http:/typophile.com/resources/widgets)
author: Jared Benson : 29 September, 2005 - 10:57am
